synopsis.text: Meruru, a magical girl anime, and Imouto to Koi Shiyo!, an adult game, are the last things Kyousuke Kousaka expects to find in his average, mundane life. But when he stumbles upon these hidden treasures belonging to his younger sister, Kirino, his world takes an unexpected turn. Kirino, a seemingly perfect student and model, hides a secret obsession with anime and eroge, a stark contrast to her flawless image. In a twist of fate, Kyousuke becomes her confidant and guide in this hidden world, helping her balance her school life and hobbies while keeping her secret safe from their unknowing parents. As he delves deeper into Kirino's world, he meets other eccentric characters and finds himself drawn into a lifestyle he never imagined. With Kirino's reputation at stake and their relationship hanging in the balance, Kyousuke must navigate this new world while trying to keep everything under control. This is a story of sibling bonds, secret lives, and the unexpected world of anime and eroge.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
